mapper.sql: parecord.pa_id as parecord_pa_id, parecord.cg_id as parecord_cg_id, parecord.sqid as parecord_sqid, parecord.pa_total as parecord_pa_total, parecord.pa_pel as parecord_pa_pel, parecord.pa_qc as parecord_pa_qc, parecord.pa_date as parecord_pa_date, parecord.pa_mn as parecord_pa_mn, parecord.pa_remark as parecord_pa_remark, parecord.toexamine as parecord_toexamine, parecord.state_id as parecord_state_id
mapper.insert: insert into parecord (cg_id, sqid, pa_total, pa_pel, pa_qc, pa_date, pa_mn, pa_remark, toexamine, state_id) values (#{cgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sqid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paPel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paQc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paMn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toexamine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stateId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into parecord
cg_id,
sqid,
pa_total,
pa_pel,
pa_qc,
pa_date,
pa_mn,
pa_remark,
toexamine,
state_id,
#{cg_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sqid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pa_total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pa_pel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pa_qc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{pa_mn,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update parecord
cg_id = #{cg_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sqid = #{sqid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pa_total = #{pa_total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pa_pel = #{pa_pel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pa_qc = #{pa_qc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pa_date = #{pa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pa_mn = #{pa_mn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pa_remark = #{pa_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toexamine = #{toexamine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state_id = #{state_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where pa_id = #{pa_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update parecord set cg_id = #{cg_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sqid = #{sqid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pa_total = #{pa_total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pa_pel = #{pa_pel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pa_qc = #{pa_qc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pa_date = #{pa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pa_mn = #{pa_mn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pa_remark = #{pa_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toexamine = #{toexamine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state_id = #{state_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pa_id = #{pa_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select p.pa_id,p.sqid,p.pa_total,p.pa_qc,p.pa_date,p.pa_mn,s.staff_name,c.cg_dh from parecord p left join apprecords a on p.state_id=a.app_records_id left join staff s on p.pa_pel=s.staff_id left join caigousq c on p.sqid=c.sqid where a.app_state='审批通过'

select p.pa_id,p.sqid,p.pa_total,p.pa_qc,p.pa_date,p.pa_mn,s.staff_name,c.cg_dh from parecord p left join apprecords a on p.state_id=a.app_records_id left join staff s on p.pa_pel=s.staff_id left join caigousq c on p.sqid=c.sqid
c.cg_dh like '%${cgDh}%'
and p.pa_total BETWEEN 0 AND '${total}'
and a.app_state='审批通过'
select p.pa_id,p.pa_total,p.pa_qc,p.pa_mn from parecord p where p.pa_id=#{paId}
